references.paper_title: Learning transferable visual models from natural language supervision
references.reason: CLIP, introduced in this paper, provides a powerful way to connect image and text features, and is crucial to EasyRef's ability to leverage the multimodal capabilities of LLMs for image generation.

references.paper_title: LoRA: Low-rank adaptation of large language models
references.reason: This paper introduces LoRA, a technique used in EasyRef to adapt the MLLM for multi-reference image generation efficiently, avoiding full model retraining.

references.paper_title: Blip-2: Bootstrapping language-image pre-training with frozen image encoders and large language models
references.reason: BLIP-2, a multimodal large language model (MLLM) is used in EasyRef to encode multiple image references and text prompts for unified image generation. This paper is crucial as the foundation of the MLLM used.

references.paper_title: SDXL: Improving latent diffusion models for high-resolution image synthesis
references.reason: Stable Diffusion XL (SDXL), a high-resolution image generation model, is used as the foundation for EasyRef and thus is a key component for its image generation capabilities.
